# Question 1

Ek program banao jo 1 se 100 tak ke beech mein woh numbers print kare jo 7 se divide ho jaate hain.

Aapki output mein yeh aana chaiye.

```
7
14
21
28
35
42
49
56
63
70
77
84
91
98
```
